Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, today I present to you the Mk. 11 Mod. 0 Gunboat by Bajeebus Shipyards, a sub-conglomerate of Bajeebus Aerospace Engineering.

The required mod is BD Armory which is found here [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-BahamutoD-s-Armory-v0-4-0-Dev-Thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-BahamutoD-s-Armory-v0-4-0-Dev-Thread)

> 
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/0Id1K)

Part file is being update for 1.0.5, I will also remove the KW parts.

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Voq08C3yv3M?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

Here's the DL [http://www./download/3c3g3fda1a7bhhh/MK_+11+Mod_+0+Gunboat.craft](http://www./download/3c3g3fda1a7bhhh/MK_+11+Mod_+0+Gunboat.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-03T18:33:39Z" title="02/03/2016 06:33  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 3, 2016</time> by JDarksword**
  
Added Video of me riding around with it

Your imgur is screwed up. try this

[noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/0Id1K)

[/noparse]
Shows:

NVM, nice boat.

Till I see it in the water.... it is NOT a boat.

Sorry.
